title: When asking Android assistant to turn off Wind down it tells me to download clock
content: When I ask Google assistant to turn off Wind down it tells me to download the clock app. I have the clock app and it is updated to the most recent version available. The assistant is also updated to the most recent version available. I tried to restart, I tried to disable and re renable but the same issue.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 2
